data.name: SpellHunter
data.detailed_description:
SpellHunter is a puzzle game in which the main objective is to find words from a wide variety of fields. In a campaign mode, the player experiences exciting stories and puzzles along the way and gets to know and love or hate different characters. By creating different characters and high score lists, excellent competitions can also be held within the family or circle of friends.

With very many beautiful and atmospheric images and music tracks, SpellHunter is relaxing and motivating. The goal is to pose tricky puzzles to the older ones and to teach the younger ones how to read and write in a playful way.
data.about_the_game:
SpellHunter is a puzzle game in which the main objective is to find words from a wide variety of fields. In a campaign mode, the player experiences exciting stories and puzzles along the way and gets to know and love or hate different characters. By creating different characters and high score lists, excellent competitions can also be held within the family or circle of friends.

With very many beautiful and atmospheric images and music tracks, SpellHunter is relaxing and motivating. The goal is to pose tricky puzzles to the older ones and to teach the younger ones how to read and write in a playful way.
data.short_description: A puzzle game for young and old ... to relax on the bus and train or learn to read and write for the younger among us. The atmospheric pictures and music pieces relax and motivate in equal measure.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Windows 7 or later
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 550/equivalent or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: High-range Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 760/equivalent or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10
  • Processor: Intel Core m3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS 10
  • Processor: Intel Core m3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
